summary:
This mod add better shining.

This mod require:
Lore Weapon Expansion.
Unique Uniques.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add better shining for:
Lore Weapon Expansion
Unique Uniques
Nightgale blade and bow

This mod require:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44179/?]Lore Weapon Expansion[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945/?]InsanitySorrow
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33292/?]Unique Uniques[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/258945/?]InsanitySorrow [/url]


I change cubemap. Install this mod after required mods.

[youtube]TlYH_miw0jA[/youtube]

My recommendation:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48526/?]SkyRealism - Shiny [/url]by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2071659/?]MTichenor
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33704/?]Nightingale Pride[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/2361177/?]lKocMoHaBTl[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28899/?]Nightingale Prime[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5854684/?]AncientVampire[/url]
author: InsanitySorrow MTichenor Raham
